occupation: Founder & Managing Director at Healthspan Global Inc
headline: Entrepreneur
summary:
Paul is the co-founder and CEO at Kalibrr. Kalibrr provides strategic talent acquisition solutions to the the fastest growing and most innovative companies in Southeast Asia.

Previously, Paul was the co-founder and President at Open Access, a pioneering BPO that help scale the people operations of numerous Silicon Valley startups in Manila.

Visit us at www.kalibrr.com to learn more about how your organization can instantly connect to hundreds of thousands of the best candidates in the Philippines and Indonesia.

#wherejobsfindyou

experiences.title: Co-Founder and COO
experiences.description: Remedy Skin Solutions is the Philippines' first online dermatology solution. Using technology, we aim to transform one of the fastest growing industries in the Philippines and become the most trusted innovative acne solution. Visit us at www.remedy.ph

experiences.title: Asia 21 Young Leader 2018
experiences.description: More than a decade ago, Asia Society had a dream: To build a network of young leaders (under the age of 40) across the Asia-Pacific as a way to promote mutual understanding and effective collaboration among the next generation’s most important and influential leaders. A decade later, we have built a movement of more than 900 powerful alumni from 40 countries and regions. Today, the Asia 21 Young Leaders Initiative stands as the Asia-Pacific’s foremost young leaders network.

experiences.title: Co-Founder and Executive Chairman
experiences.description:
Kalibrr connects talent and opportunity and is the fastest growing employability platform in Southeast Asia with over 8,000,000 members.

If you're a jobseeker, visit us at http://www.kalibrr.com

If you're an employer and are hiring, start now at https://www.kalibrr.com/employers

experiences.title: Endeavor Entrepreneur
experiences.description: Endeavor is the world's leading community of high-impact entrepreneurs. Selected to join at the February 2020 Saudi Arabia ISP

experiences.title: Unreasonable FUTURE Fellow
experiences.description:
Unreasonable is an organization, investment fund, and private global network dedicated to supporting entrepreneurs positioned to bend history in the right direction. Unreasonable's mission is to drive resources into and break down barriers for select companies leveraging profit to solve the seemingly intractable social and environmental challenges of our time.

Unreasonable envisions a world in which the most valuable and influential companies are those solving humanity's most pressing challenges. Unreasonable has raised over $2.3 billion dollars in funding and works with 162 entrepreneurs who actively impacting the lives of over 260 million individuals across 180+ countries.

A unique partnership with Fossil Foundation, Pearson and Accenture, Unreasonable FUTURE is aligning the promise of leading edge technologies with the future of inclusive work and social equality.

experiences.title: Founder & Managing Director
experiences.description: Healthspan Global Inc is the exclusive distributor of Innoaesthetics and Meline in the Philippines. Healthspan is also the exclusive distributor of SkinPen, the first U.S. FDA approved micro needling device.

experiences.title: Young Global Leader
experiences.description:
We are an accelerator for a dynamic community of exceptional people with the vision, courage, and influence to drive positive change in the world.

Our growing membership of more than 1,400 members and alumni of 120 nationalities includes civic and business innovators, entrepreneurs, technology pioneers, educators, activists, artists, journalists, and more.

Aligned with the World Economic Forum’s mission, we seek to drive public-private co-operation in the global public interest. We are united by the belief that today’s pressing problems present an opportunity to build a better future across sectors and boundaries.

experiences.title: Co-Founder & President
experiences.description: Open Access BPO is a pioneer in the Philippine BPO industry. Open Access BPO helps Silicon Valley's top venture backed startups scale their operations and has worked with Mint.com, Friendster, StumbleUpon, Adchemy, Goodreads, Lyft and TripAdvisor.

experiences.title: Product Manager
experiences.description: Key driver in setting up captive shared services operations in Bangalore, India with over 100+ FTE in 18 months spanning the range of Mercantila's ecommerce needs including merchandising, support, engineering, and product management.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Forbes Asia 100 To Watch - FedEx Small Business Grant Finalist
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: From underwater drones to satellite propulsion systems and everything in between, the inaugural Forbes Asia 100 to Watch list spotlights notable small companies and startups on the rise across the Asia-Pacific region. At a time when economies worldwide are struggling from the pandemic, these agile companies are on a growth path. Their inclusion in the list comes in part from addressing problems such as improving transportation in congested cities, expanding affordable connectivity in remote regions and preventing food waste. Seventeen countries and territories are represented. Top categories include biotechnology & healthcare, e-commerce & retail, food & hospitality and education & recruitment. The lively startup communities in India and Singapore produced 22 and 19 companies, respectively. Hong Kong has 10 and Indonesia eight. Mainland China has just four, as many candidates were above the required maximums for revenues or funding.

recommendations:
Natasha Villaroman



Paul is a visionary and a hustler at the same time. I worked under him closely as Business Development, and learned to adapt quickly to the pressures of working in a startup. He built Kalibrr by recruiting and enabling the best and the brightest talents in the PH, and hopes to give the same impact to other companies who need talent. He's a leader and mentor to the team, who shows exceptional charisma and drive to bring the organization forward.

Sharon P.



I would leverage Paul's talents in building bright, innovative, and data-driven teams to build the largest job training platform in the world.

Paul Rivera is an extremely deep thinkerr. He consumes information in vast, vast quantities daily and educations himself on the state of global economic conditions.
